title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Build AI-powered developer experiences with MCP on ECS and EKS (CNS358)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 在 ECS 和 EKS 上使用 MCP 构建 AI 驱动的开发者体验 (CNS358)
abstract: AI coding agents are transforming how developers build and operate modern cloud-native applications. With tools such as Kiro CLI, Kiro IDE, or any MCP-compatible AI coding assistant, developers are embracing AI to move faster and scale smarter. This session explores how Model Context Protocol (MCP) servers for AWS services like ECS and EKS provide real-time, contextual code assistance to AI-powered coding agents. Learn how MCP servers help developers streamline code generation, deployment, and debugging by embedding infrastructure awareness directly into the AI assistant. Discover how teams are using MCP to boost productivity, reduce complexity, and build more reliable containerized applications at scale.
abstract_cn: AI 编码代理正在改变开发人员构建和运营现代云原生应用程序的方式。借助 Kiro CLI、Kiro IDE 或任何兼容 MCP 的 AI 编码助手等工具,开发人员正在利用 AI 更快地行动并更智能地扩展。本次会议探讨了针对 AWS 服务(如 ECS 和 EKS)的模型上下文协议 (MCP) 服务器如何为 AI 驱动的编码代理提供实时的上下文代码辅助。了解 MCP 服务器如何通过将基础设施感知直接嵌入 AI 助手来帮助开发人员简化代码生成、部署和调试。探索团队如何使用 MCP 来提高生产力、降低复杂性并大规模构建更可靠的容器化应用程序。
